entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
